Text:
Can I get you to upload the movie 'UNDERGROUND' It has an 8.1 IMDb rating and I believe you would do many of your fans a big favour! Cheers!
Further to my previous request I would like you to consider a movie from the same director, named "Black Cat, White Cat'... also an 8.0 IMDb rating... worth a 1080p BluRay ? Much obliged if you could find it in your heart to consider my requests!
